# NWProtocolDefinition

**Class**

The abstract superclass for identifying a network protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
class NWProtocolDefinition
```

## Inspecting Protocol Definitions

- **name**: The name of the protocol.

## Adding Protocols to Connections

- **NWProtocolOptions**: The abstract superclass for configuring the options of a network protocol.

## Inherited By

- NWProtocolFramer.Definition

## Conforms To

- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
